data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 75) AND (executions IS NULL OR executions < 2000) AND (user_calls IS NULL OR user_calls < 1000)) AS 'Health Score' FROM oracle_database_instance FACET oracle_database_instance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(oracle_database_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM oracle_database_instance FACET oracle_database_database_name

presentation.title: Database Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Database of this Instance

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(oracle_database_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM oracle_database_instance FACET status
SELECT sum(sessions_current_utilization) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Sessions Current Utilization
presentation.notes: The number of sessions (with maximum sessions_limit) that are currently being used.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(executions) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Executions (per Second)
presentation.notes: Represents the rate of SQL command executions over the sampling period.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_io_time) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average I/O Time (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The average Input/Output time of the physical storage on the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_read_time) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Read Time (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: Average read time to the physical storage on the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_write_time) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Write Time (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: Average write time to the physical storage on the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(free_system_global_area_memory_available) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Free System Global Area Memory Available (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Free System Global Area Memory Available

data.nrql: SELECT average(host_cpu_usage) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(host_cpu_utilization) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(io_throughput) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(physical_read_io_requests) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(physical_write_total_io_requests) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Physical Write Total I/O Requests (per Second)

data.nrql: SELECT average(user_calls) FROM oracle_database_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
